“ [You]1573-you need to understand this real quickly , [Mr. Titan]5-mr. titan , ”[35-her]

[She]35-her said with sarcasm , “ [I]35-her will not marry [you]36-he , ever , ”[35-her] [she]35-her finished and tugged at [her]35-her arm again . [He]36-he was n’t hurting [her]35-her in any way but the grip was firm and [he]36-he did n’t seem to be in any hurry to let [her]35-her go . “ [You]35-her did n’t call [me]36-he [Mr. Titan]5-mr. titan when [you]35-her were screaming out [my]36-he name in passion , ”[36-he] [he]36-he said to [her]35-her , taking more offense to the formal name than any of [her]35-her other words . [They]40-they glared at [one another]41-one another , neither willing to back down . [They]40-they were both breathing hard as the silence drug on . [Drew]6-drew suddenly pulled [her]35-her up against [him]6-drew and crushed [his]6-drew lips down on [hers]35-her . When [she]35-her came out of [her]35-her shock , [she]35-her pushed against [him]6-drew for about three seconds , before the heat started to pool in [her]35-her stomach and thighs . [She]35-her had n’t been kissed like that for five months and [her]35-her hormones were all over the place with the pregnancy . [Her]35-her anger quickly changed to an all - consuming passion as [his]6-drew lips continued to stroke [hers]35-her , while [his]6-drew hands rubbed up and down [her]35-her back .

Prologue

Chapter One

[Trinity]12-trinity laid down on the oversized towel , letting out a sigh of total ecstasy . [She]12-trinity could feel the sun shining down on [her]12-trinity closed eyelids . [She]12-trinity was so relaxed , [she]12-trinity felt as if [she]12-trinity could float off in the crystal clear water , only a few feet away from [her]12-trinity . This was the first impulsive thing [she]12-trinity ’d ever done in [her]12-trinity life . [She]12-trinity ’d always been [the responsible , stable , reliable person]83-the responsible , stable , reliable person but after being walked all over for the hundredth time , [she]12-trinity packed one bag , hopped on [a jet]84-a jet and ended up on [a secluded island off [the North Coast of [Spain]1-spain]86-the north coast of spain]85-a secluded island off the north coast of spain . The last portion of [her]12-trinity trip had been on [a small charter aircraft]87-a small charter aircraft , with spectacular views of [the Mediterranean Sea]2-the mediterranean sea . It was unlike anything [she]12-trinity ’d ever seen before . [She]12-trinity ’d been unable to take [her]12-trinity eyes away from the window , as [the aircraft]88-the aircraft circled [the island]89-the island and landed in [paradise]90-paradise . [She]12-trinity ’d spent every last dime [she]12-trinity so strictly saved over the last ten years , on [the mega expensive , all - inclusive resort]91-the mega expensive , all - inclusive resort . As [she]12-trinity lay there , soaking up the sun , [she]12-trinity knew every penny of it was worth eating ramen noodles for the next year , once [she]12-trinity got back [home]92-home . [Her]12-trinity life had been flipped upside down a few days ago and [she]12-trinity ’d finally snapped , like [many people]93-many people had predicted would one day happen , if [she]12-trinity continued to let [people]94-people abuse [her]12-trinity good nature . [She]12-trinity ’d always been [the people pleaser in [[her]12-trinity group of [friends]97-friends]96-her group of friends and in the few romantic relationships [she]12-trinity ’d been in]95-the people pleaser in her group of friends and in the few romantic relationships she ’d been in . [Her]12-trinity last relationship was the reason [she]12-trinity was now soaking up the sun and flat broke . [Her]12-trinity mouth stretched out in a pleased grin . [She]12-trinity was starting to get too warm , so [she]12-trinity stood up and started walking towards [the inviting water]98-the inviting water . [She]12-trinity was trying really hard not to think about [[her]12-trinity ex]99-her ex but [the man]100-the man invaded [her]12-trinity thoughts , which caused a frown to pucker [her]12-trinity brows . [She]12-trinity had been with [[her]12-trinity supposedly straight - laced boyfriend]101-her supposedly straight - laced boyfriend for six months and really loved [him]100-the man , or at least [she]12-trinity thought [she]12-trinity did . [She]12-trinity ’d decided it was time to take the next step in [their]102-their relationship and had gotten all dressed up , planning on waiting for [him]100-the man to get [home]92-home from [the office]104-the office . [She]12-trinity did n’t really understand [his]100-the man job . [She]12-trinity just knew [he]100-the man owned some business that developed software . [He]100-the man tried talking about it to [her]12-trinity and [she]12-trinity ’d nod along , as if [she]12-trinity understood but in reality , it had bored [her]12-trinity to pieces . [She]12-trinity had the key to get into [[his]100-the man place]105-his place , from when [he]100-the man ’d been on a business trip the previous month and [she]12-trinity ’d gone over to water [[his]100-the man plants]106-his plants . [She]12-trinity ’d forgotten [she]12-trinity even had the key but was very grateful , considering [she]12-trinity was going to plan a romantic evening for [them]107-their . It was such a cliché because of course [she]12-trinity ’d opened the door , with nervous anticipation , only to find [the stupid creep in bed with [[his]100-the man secretary]109-his secretary]108-the stupid creep in bed with his secretary . [He]100-the man had , of course , begged [her]12-trinity not to leave and promised it was a one - time thing , that [he]100-the man ’d temporarily lost [his]100-the man mind . [Trinity]12-trinity smiled as [she]12-trinity thought about [his]100-the man moment of groveling . As [she]12-trinity ’d walked out the door , [she]12-trinity vowed [she]12-trinity was done with [businessmen]110-businessmen for good . [She]12-trinity was tired of being [[their]107-their perfect girlfriend , who did [their]107-their laundry , cleaned [their]107-their places and anything else [they]107-their asked]111-their perfect girlfriend , who did their laundry , cleaned their places and anything else they asked . [She]12-trinity was done being [the girl]112-the girl [everyone]1592-everyone could depend on . [She]12-trinity was done always playing it safe . [She]12-trinity was certainly done with being [a doormat]114-a doormat . [She]12-trinity dived into the water and swam out until [her]12-trinity arms started to ache . [She]12-trinity turned around , surprised at how far [she]12-trinity ’d gotten from [the shore]115-the shore . [She]12-trinity was n’t worried about it though , as [she]12-trinity was [a strong swimmer]116-a strong swimmer . Even if [she]12-trinity did get tired , [she]12-trinity could float on [her]12-trinity back for hours . [She]12-trinity began the long trip back to [shore]117-shore and continued thinking about those life changing days . [Trinity]12-trinity had driven back to [[her]12-trinity boring , beige apartment]118-her boring , beige apartment and started searching the internet for [exotic resorts]119-exotic resorts . [She]12-trinity ’d found a new place on [an island]120-an island , off of [the coast of [Spain]1-spain]121-the coast of spain , booked [her]12-trinity ticket and went to [the mall]122-the mall to purchase a few sundresses and a new bikini . [She]12-trinity ’d slept incredibly well that night and was off to [the airport]80-the airport first thing in the morning . [She]12-trinity landed yesterday and had wandered [the beach]124-the beach as [she]12-trinity watched the most spectacular sunset [she]12-trinity ’d ever seen in [her]12-trinity life . Tears had fallen down [her]12-trinity face from the sheer beauty of the colors splashed across the sky . [She]12-trinity was exhausted as [she]12-trinity climbed back up to [[her]12-trinity room]125-her room . [She]12-trinity was also feeling better than [she]12-trinity had in a very long time . For a few seconds after [she]12-trinity woke up that morning , [she]12-trinity ’d been confused about where [she]12-trinity was . [She]12-trinity ’d sipped a few too many margaritas in [the outdoor bar]126-the outdoor bar . Once it all came back to [her]12-trinity , [she]12-trinity could n’t keep the smile from [her]12-trinity face . [She]12-trinity slipped on [her]12-trinity most daring bikini and headed towards [the incredible beach]127-the incredible beach , where [she]12-trinity lounged for hours , until [she]12-trinity finally dove into [the crystal clear sea water]128-the crystal clear sea water . [Trinity]12-trinity snapped back to the present , as [she]12-trinity continued to swim closer to [the shore]115-the shore and [she]12-trinity felt nothing but the warmth from the sun and the coolness of the glorious water . There was no stress , no feelings of regret and no doubt [she]12-trinity ’d made the right choice . That ’s all [she]12-trinity felt , until something smashed into [her]12-trinity head . There was a shooting pain and then [she]12-trinity felt blackness surround [her]12-trinity . [Her]12-trinity last thought , before [she]12-trinity started sinking beneath the surface of [the water]38-the water , was [[her]12-trinity room]125-her room was non - refundable .

[Drew]6-drew was lying on [his]6-drew board , swimming out to catch a wave . [He]6-drew ’d arrived at [[his]6-drew resort]132-his resort earlier that morning and felt good . [He]6-drew ’d told [[his]6-drew staff]133-his staff [they]133-his staff were to pretend not to know [him]6-drew over the next seventy - two hours and then [he]6-drew ’d hit [the beach]124-the beach . [He]6-drew could certainly get used to being [a tourist]135-a tourist , [he]6-drew thought with a laugh . The day had been relaxing so far and [he]6-drew could feel [his]6-drew stress fading away . As [he]6-drew paddled out further into [the sea]136-the sea , [he]6-drew suddenly felt a thump and turned [his]6-drew head , to see a body start sinking into the water . “ What the hell ? ”[6-drew] [he]6-drew yelled , before diving off [his]6-drew board to retrieve [whoever [he]6-drew ’d just ran into]137-whoever he ’d just ran into . [No one]138-no one was ever out in the water this far unless [they]133-his staff were surfing . [He]6-drew supposed [their]133-his staff board could ’ve gotten away from [them]133-his staff but [he]6-drew did n’t see [one floating around anywhere without a rider]139-one floating around anywhere without a rider . [He]6-drew caught [the person]140-the person before [they]133-his staff sunk too far , realizing it was [a woman]141-a woman . [He]6-drew threw [her]141-a woman up on [his]6-drew board and quickly paddled back to [shore]117-shore . [He]6-drew immediately began CPR and let out a relieved sigh , when [she]141-a woman choked up some water and started to breathe . [She]141-a woman looked up through blood - shot eyes and groaned , reaching for [her]141-a woman head , where [he]6-drew could already see a large lump forming . [He]6-drew was surprised by the clenching in [his]6-drew gut . [She]141-a woman was spectacular , in [an understated girl next door way]143-an understated girl next door way . [She]141-a woman had long blonde hair , which was currently plastered over [her]141-a woman face and emerald colored eyes . [He]6-drew ’d never quite seen that shade before . [They]144-they had a sparkle to [them]144-they , holding [his]6-drew attention . [They]144-they were surrounded by long lashes , which were quickly blinking up at [him]6-drew . [Her]141-a woman body was lithe and far to pale , to be so unprotected on [these beaches]145-these beaches . [He]6-drew could already see a tint of red all over , which was going to bother [her]141-a woman in the morning if [she]141-a woman did n’t get plenty of lotion on [her]141-a woman . [He]6-drew felt [his]6-drew body tighten , at the thought of rubbing lotion all over [her]141-a woman smooth skin . [Her]141-a woman curves were perfect , neither too small nor too large . Chapter Five

Chapter Seven

[She]12-trinity sat on the couch while [he]6-drew packed all [her]12-trinity possessions . Chapter Ten
